name: The Life of little Earl
description:
This is a game for LudumDare 47 Theme Stuck in a loop

You play as Earl. Earl does the same every day. Have Fun.

Move with WASD and interact with Mous-Leftclick

I must attmit we haven’t finished the game as intendet. It was supposed that the level changes every day and if you find the changes Earl would have been able to brack out of the loop at some point.
